member.name: HTTP_CACHE_POLICY
member.summary: TheHTTP_CACHE_POLICY structure is used to define a cache policy associated with a cached response fragment.

summary.para: This parameter is one of the following values from the to control how an associated response or response fragment is cached.

listheader.description: Do not cache the data at all.
Cache the data until the application explicitly releases it.
Cache the data for a number of seconds specified by the SecondsToLive member.

member.name: HTTP_CACHE_POLICY.SecondsToLive
member.summary: When the Policy member is equal to HttpCachePolicyTimeToLive, data is cached for SecondsToLive seconds before it is released. For other values of Policy, SecondsToLive is ignored.
